resources.string: The Big Incredibly Funny Inverse Treasure Hunt 2.0 with 30% more Fun - For Free
"Audio replay is currently not working. Restarting the game or phone might help."
Here is a list of all possible levels. To see the help for an individual level click on its icon!
To lose part of your treasure play the level of your choice by pressing its icon. Levels that are marked with a question mark cannot be played yet.

Choose one of the menu items to play, get some help, or to see the credits. \nOnce you started a game you will see a map that displays the levels you can currently play and your progress of your quest to lose your treasure.
The Big Incredibly Funny Inverse Treasure Hunt
Not there yet! Play a different level to get there!

This game was developed during the course Computer Graphics on Mobile Devices, at Vienna University of Technology with the help of many people, open source projects and creative commons (CC) artwork. The full version of this game consists of many more levels. The source code of the game (including all levels) can be found at the public source code repository. At the web page of the Institute of Computergraphics and Algorithms, more information about the course Computer Graphics on Mobile Devices can be found.
Thanks to everybody who contributed to this project:
"To start a level, press a button that is ahead and already visible!"
"To reach this point you have to lose more money! Press a level icon that is already visible!"
"Congratulations - You lost all your wealth! Do you already feel your newly gained freedom!"

Everybody knows the situation: You’re playing a jump \’n\’ run level, busily collecting coins. But no one has ever thought about who’s the one that fills up all the empty levels again.

That’s exactly where you are needed! Fill up the empty level with coins again and do that as fast as possible. Because there’s one thing heros do not have – and that’s patience!

Move your hero assistant with the right thumb through the level.

Use the “left” and “right” buttons to move left or right. The jump-button is divided into three areas. Use the middle to just jump. Using the left or right area, you’re able to simultanously jump and move into the selected direction.\n\nYou have to fill in two different types of coins.
These coins are easy to spread. Just put them into the level and they will stay there. On the other hand, there are diamonds.
You’ll pick up these stones again if you jump into the same field again. However you’ll fill up the level, NEVER ever jump into the spikes!!!\n\nHave fun!
